summary: This bill, the Child Care Access Means Parents In Schools (CCAMPIS) Reauthorization Act, amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide grants to eligible institutions of higher education. These grants will support child care services for student parents, aiming to facilitate their success in postsecondary education. The bill outlines eligible institutions, authorized grant amounts, permitted uses of funds (including campus-based and subsidized child care), application requirements, reporting obligations, and authorization of appropriations of $500 million annually from 2026-2031.
